remarks: A deduction unionizing a non-unionized collection of virtual hypotheses.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 3-Dec-2015.)  Proof was revised to accomodate a possible future version of ~ df-tru .  (Revised by David A. Wheeler, 8-May-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
uunT1.1 $e |- ( ( T. /\ ph ) -> ps ) $.
uunT1 $p |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
